choices.text: There's nothing we can do right now.
They need to work through it.

4874c5ea-a3b5-49ea-afb3-8c65b112a7e6.description: There are major heatwaves throughout {region}. People are unable to work and the most vulnerable are suffering under unbearable heat.
4874c5ea-a3b5-49ea-afb3-8c65b112a7e6.name: Heatwaves
4874c5ea-a3b5-49ea-afb3-8c65b112a7e6.notes: What are more realistic estimations of % population dying in a severe heatwave?

f8ba7655-5ecf-4caf-9c09-730f94c43e37.flavor: The Cold War took a surprising turn as spontaneous socialist revolutions broke out throughout the world, with the rapid capitulation of the global capitalist class and formation of a planetary socialist government.
f8ba7655-5ecf-4caf-9c09-730f94c43e37.notes:
1990:
27962.868 Mt CO2/yr
306.419 Mt CH4/yr = 7660.475 Mt CO2eq/yr
9860.000 kt N2O/yr = 9.860 Mt N2O/yr = 2938.280 Mt CO2eq/yr

CH4 GWP = 25
N2O GWP = 298

Total: 38561.623 Mt CO2eq/yr

from: "History - van Marle et al. (2017) & Hoesly et al. (2018)" https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb/dsd

Temperature anomaly: https://climate.nasa.gov/vital-signs/global-temperature/

Ozone depletion of 5% in 1990 from: https://csl.noaa.gov/assessments/ozone/2014/twentyquestions/Q13.pdf

7df3f73c-d258-4f3c-9370-f6fe72ec7250.notes:
Emissions and temperature from MESSAGE-GLOBIOM - SSP2-Baseline:
https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb/dsd
Assuming linear growth through each decade

Mt CO2/yr
2020: 42262.425
2030: 46727.551
2022 = 42262.425 + (46727.551-42262.425)/10 * 2 = 43155.4502

kt N2O/yr
2020: 9742.624
2030: 10959.872
2022 = 9986.0736

Mt CH4/yr
2020: 345.346
2030: 373.120
2022 = 350.9008

Temperature:
2020: 1.241
2030: 1.483
2022 = 1.2894
Though https://climate.nasa.gov/vital-signs/global-temperature/ has 1.02 for 2020

Ozone depletion:
According to: https://csl.noaa.gov/assessments/ozone/2014/twentyquestions/Q13.pdf
Was about 3% in 2014, and according to https://csl.noaa.gov/assessments/ozone/2018/twentyquestions:
"Since 1997, total ozone has increased in the range of 0.3-1.2% per decade."
and https://csl.noaa.gov/assessments/ozone/2018/downloads/2018OzoneAssessment.pdf
"Outside the polar regions, upper stratospheric ozone has increased by 1–3% per decade since 2000."

bddf6348-b7e0-48f0-9541-57614061a16e.notes:
Emissions from MESSAGE-GLOBIOM - SSP2-45:
https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb/dsd
Assuming linear growth through each decade

Mt CO2/yr
2030: 46727.551
2040: 51606.452
2035 = 49167.0015

kt N2O/yr
2030: 10959.872
2040: 11930.028
2035 = 11444.95

Mt CH4/yr
2030: 373.120
2040: 393.495
2035 = 383.3075

Temperature
2030: 1.483
2040: 1.762
2035: 1.6225

31ac9a2e-af8c-4422-b2d1-bf86684aaee5.flavor: After decades of business-as-usual, corporate and governmental promises of "net zero by 2050" have achieved next to nothing...if they were ever meaningful to begin with. The world is well into the most turbulent century in recorded history, and it is too late to undo its planetary disasters. But these disasters destroyed the foundations of the capitalist order; this greatest of crises resoundingly proved the need for a different way forward.
31ac9a2e-af8c-4422-b2d1-bf86684aaee5.notes:
Emissions from MESSAGE-GLOBIOM - SSP2-45:
https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb/dsd
Assuming linear growth through each decade

Mt CO2/yr
2050: 56651.629

kt N2O/yr
2050: 12689.418

Mt CH4/yr
2050: 411.433

Temperature
2050: 2.053

73a78433-2cc7-4563-9adf-b7389c451636.description: The sudden decline of {at_risk_species} has wreaked havoc on the local ecosystem, rippling out and destabilizing the area.
73a78433-2cc7-4563-9adf-b7389c451636.name: Species Collapse

4e3ac93f-1207-488d-8dff-8ad8fd2226d2.name: Cellular Meat
4e3ac93f-1207-488d-8dff-8ad8fd2226d2.notes:
takes significant scientific capital

seems like lab-meat ain't coming any time soon:

https://thecounter.org/lab-grown-cultivated-meat-cost-at-scale/

A friend of mine who work on the topic (Jan Dutkiewicz) says that lab meat might be possible at scale by 2040 or 2050, but that's a big if

makes vegan or vegetarian mandate easier

What are its energy and resource requirements?

Probably too little too late

Maybe it will cut into meat consumption by 20% or so, but will not replace meat unless there is a mandate

f2fef5c9-633c-49eb-bfb8-95292bb9debf.description: Restore, remediate, and/or reforest any land that has been degraded or otherwise affected by human activity.
f2fef5c9-633c-49eb-bfb8-95292bb9debf.name: Remediation and Restoration

ff462e0a-aea0-4d87-9106-887eda1a7201.description: Perennial versions of the major cereal crops mean they don't need to be replanted each year, disturbing the soil less and sequestering more in deep roots.
ff462e0a-aea0-4d87-9106-887eda1a7201.name: Perennial Cereals

148363ad-6082-4762-b97f-c267d7508dca.desc: If the player has made at least 10 decisions and over 50% of them are marked as Malthusian
148363ad-6082-4762-b97f-c267d7508dca.name: is_malthusian

e5aad5a1-6dc1-415c-a590-d83e2dcb901a.description: We need continuous monitoring to make sure that this doesn't happen, but you pulled the restoration program!
e5aad5a1-6dc1-415c-a590-d83e2dcb901a.name: Land restoration programs backtrack

3b7ce92d-b11a-4325-9cfd-a3ad3c44ef5c.description: Mass revolts throughout {region}, with people calling to secede from Gosplant.
3b7ce92d-b11a-4325-9cfd-a3ad3c44ef5c.name: Unrest - Revolts

80ce20f8-d566-4684-a929-8c64440ee9ab.description: The constant smoke from wildfires is impacting energy and food production throughout {region}, and causing respiratory disease.
80ce20f8-d566-4684-a929-8c64440ee9ab.name: Wildfires - Smoke

30c7873c-14b2-4744-b621-8d9f80798b67.description: {region} has called a vote and decided to secede from Gosplant.
30c7873c-14b2-4744-b621-8d9f80798b67.name: Unrest - Secession

3e06f4f5-b9e6-4273-b68e-d3ef6b64df41.description: An ancient forest was nearly wiped out after an unprecedented series of wildfires.
3e06f4f5-b9e6-4273-b68e-d3ef6b64df41.name: Wildfires - Ancient Loss

9659d41d-4330-4acb-9833-67ff4310a9f2.description: More than 50% of the world's permafrost has melted.
9659d41d-4330-4acb-9833-67ff4310a9f2.name: Permafrost Melting

6ec2a46b-781b-47f3-ac8a-4accd26c14ff.description: A strange new illness is sweeping through the North. Researchers suspect it originated in the Arctic.
6ec2a46b-781b-47f3-ac8a-4accd26c14ff.name: Permafrost Contagion

bf57890d-6628-4de0-919a-c886ca029773.description: The lowest fish catches in recent memory are undermining the abilities of many communities to feed themselves.
bf57890d-6628-4de0-919a-c886ca029773.name: Fish Depletion

fb3f3cfe-751b-4063-b9a8-129c600a5573.description: Massive storms rolling through {region} are causing power outages and flooding.
fb3f3cfe-751b-4063-b9a8-129c600a5573.name: Massive Thunderstorms

9141df89-3a80-4a8d-886d-8bebdcc819d3.description: The Arctic is basically ice-free now
9141df89-3a80-4a8d-886d-8bebdcc819d3.name: Blue Ocean Event

b9cde3bb-7c3b-49ac-8760-076008a4485d.description: Constant brownouts making life difficult throughout the world
b9cde3bb-7c3b-49ac-8760-076008a4485d.name: Brownouts

34a37330-27df-451e-8b8c-5fba43b86c5d.name: Nuclear Meltdown

f9edcde6-64af-4a86-8770-6aeddb566c06.description: The last {high_risk_species} died in captivity. People around the world mourn the loss of a unique creature.
f9edcde6-64af-4a86-8770-6aeddb566c06.name: Species Death

9f1210be-e712-43db-90d4-6c47e20552fe.description: Ozone layer depletion is reaching alarming levels. Could it have something to do with our SRM project?
9f1210be-e712-43db-90d4-6c47e20552fe.name: Ozone Depletion

7d6752f7-01ae-44fa-8f3f-049d5633aa9a.name: Island Abandoned
7d6752f7-01ae-44fa-8f3f-049d5633aa9a.notes: Not sure what a good value for the sea level rise is here?

f637bf55-04b5-4003-a1a8-1df41e766ab1.description: People's moods low from living under a grey sky
f637bf55-04b5-4003-a1a8-1df41e766ab1.name: SRM - SAD

8c01d968-2d03-41f1-acc1-ca3a18307432.description: Urban gardening becomes a global trend
8c01d968-2d03-41f1-acc1-ca3a18307432.name: Urban Gardening

11ace984-b29b-4043-8fd7-cf712f3de6f1.description: Urban farming grows into a way for towns to meet more of their own food needs. With the plummeting use of personal vehicles, towns have reclaimed space for community uses.
11ace984-b29b-4043-8fd7-cf712f3de6f1.name: Urban Farming

1ac6f4f2-87f9-4f45-879e-e262de9862c5.description: Crop yields and plant growth lag under the sunless sky, slowing carbon sequestration
1ac6f4f2-87f9-4f45-879e-e262de9862c5.name: SRM - Crop Yields

2c9d895f-2621-4db8-b59d-d25035429030.name: UFO Visit
2c9d895f-2621-4db8-b59d-d25035429030.description: Reports of strange lights in the skies are coming in from all over the world. What could it mean?

866ccd6a-e618-45eb-932a-5bd45134a43e.description: Those strange lights were visitors from another star system! They gifted us with an incredible carbon absorbing technology.
866ccd6a-e618-45eb-932a-5bd45134a43e.name: UFO Gift

d59cc48a-39d4-40c5-b8b8-fefcb71c2e14.description:
Those strange lights were visitors from another star system!
They launched an attack on major cities, claiming we were waging a war against all life on the planet!
d59cc48a-39d4-40c5-b8b8-fefcb71c2e14.name: UFO War

0ef195f8-b4b2-42e5-b5a7-142e497fe707.description: A new "climate diet" culinary trend is {new_cuisine}
0ef195f8-b4b2-42e5-b5a7-142e497fe707.name: New Cuisine

f7b1721c-a1dd-4250-b9b3-760d4d372cd2.name: Long-Range Electric Aviation
f7b1721c-a1dd-4250-b9b3-760d4d372cd2.notes:
TV: I don't think this is doing to happen any time soon, perhaps in the second half of the century. Only things being proposed now are for 500km jaunts, which are useless.

https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20200617-the-largest-electric-plane-ever-to-fly

Also see this:

https://www.ft.com/content/87941b8d-0460-4b54-a861-d6ebc6da29e8

44585837-00f9-4af8-9fba-e03031f82095.description: A group calling themselves "The Meat Militia" has started organizing and stealing feed
44585837-00f9-4af8-9fba-e03031f82095.name: Meat Militia

f718e86e-10a2-4b71-8ae5-6dd637e77324.description: Excessive UV exposure is slowing plant growth across the planet.
f718e86e-10a2-4b71-8ae5-6dd637e77324.name: Plant UV Exposure

831dc1b4-433d-402a-aeb5-4033fd3f533d.description: Rates of skin cancer, eye damage, and genetic disorders rapidly climbing.
831dc1b4-433d-402a-aeb5-4033fd3f533d.name: Ozone Health

bfc030ff-ff6a-4b27-84e2-eb352eb8c22f.description: Large amounts of people are fleeing {region} because of increasingly inhospitable conditions, but we are maintaining borders
bfc030ff-ff6a-4b27-84e2-eb352eb8c22f.name: Migrations - Borders

253493da-791c-4d22-a797-550cb370635d.name: Closed Borders
253493da-791c-4d22-a797-550cb370635d.description: Maintain closed borders across regions to manage migrations

b62c8a90-4971-48c6-8a7f-84a17b1cc4c1.name: Doom Cult - Formation

e33376f6-8174-4393-83af-53da7c17d38c.name: Doom Cult - Spreading
e33376f6-8174-4393-83af-53da7c17d38c.description: The internet cult is spreading, sowing fear and hopelessness wherever they go

a65a9e10-a61f-46fe-b659-60828bedd8ed.description: The Doom Cult is growing in numbers and calling for the accelerated destruction of humanity
a65a9e10-a61f-46fe-b659-60828bedd8ed.name: Doom Cult - Acceleration

79358503-7f9a-4632-a6e8-1ff89cb6062a.description: The Doom Cult is launching attacks
79358503-7f9a-4632-a6e8-1ff89cb6062a.name: Doom Cult - Attacks

6af9b609-9b33-4f2a-b4ac-0228a399df22.description: A group calling themselves the "Green Meanies" have started sabotaging industrial facilities
6af9b609-9b33-4f2a-b4ac-0228a399df22.name: Green Meanies - Formation

19ddca23-9595-4f6d-8b9b-9be263111d60.name: is_falc

b6b4fd98-6c47-4703-a27e-2233bd9f2387.desc: If the player has made at least 10 decisions and over 50% of them are marked as HES

7ad0d7a0-b901-4157-8de7-9a7877d620d2.description: A new age of leisure. People can swim in the afternoon and read in the evening
7ad0d7a0-b901-4157-8de7-9a7877d620d2.name: Success - Leisure

0dd6823c-5d86-465c-8c8e-79818ee0e6f6.description: With all of our rewilding and restoration efforts people have taken to brewing their own "invasive" wines and beers to help cull them back.
0dd6823c-5d86-465c-8c8e-79818ee0e6f6.name: Invasive Wines

0a4ca3e3-a636-4b3d-9247-95b523617024.description: I worry that pollinator populations are declining to dangerously low levels.
0a4ca3e3-a636-4b3d-9247-95b523617024.name: Pollinator - Decline

dbcd3e9d-50f3-4c03-a20a-e9d274a4cfc9.description: Almost all major pollinators are on the brink of extinction. We will have to manually pollinate our crops.
dbcd3e9d-50f3-4c03-a20a-e9d274a4cfc9.name: Pollinator - Collapse

e43ecf83-f1af-4237-8ed2-ef8dd26dcfdd.notes:

things like:
disrupting food webs (biodiversity impacts)
carbon sequestration impacts?

e2589831-62a0-46df-b4f4-dc9f8ab047b7.description: Abandoned extraction facilities leaking waste into water supply...we should really consider a program to remediate these sites.
e2589831-62a0-46df-b4f4-dc9f8ab047b7.name: Waste Leakage

fea2b749-ada5-4a1f-8274-2b4a6f655c09.name: Flooded Farms

776c7a07-db17-450e-82b0-5bf959dd1eff.name: SRM - Solar Impacts

9049ab8c-2098-4445-bce5-a9c418e69478.description: A black market for gasoline was uncovered.
9049ab8c-2098-4445-bce5-a9c418e69478.name: Black Market - Gasoline

af009b42-4756-4849-9739-b7bf098f88ce.description: A black market for meat was uncovered.
af009b42-4756-4849-9739-b7bf098f88ce.name: Black Market - Meat

03dcaceb-b5fe-4a6a-8f4d-e8cec7840524.description: Decline in coffee and chocolate production
03dcaceb-b5fe-4a6a-8f4d-e8cec7840524.name: Coffee and Chocolate Decline

4015e33f-8c54-4fae-becd-6892f8206e62.description: Sewage overflows from flooding leading to outbreaks of disease
4015e33f-8c54-4fae-becd-6892f8206e62.name: Sewage Overflow

397c3ba4-91af-4255-b622-7e1ba09a6fec.notes:
If agricultural/range land use continues to expand or biofuels grown in region. Higher temperatures

20-25% of the Amazon is destroyed, then transition will become irreversible. Currently at 17%...

more likely with higher temps

https://news.mongabay.com/2018/03/amazon-forest-to-savannah-tipping-point-could-be-far-closer-than-thought-commentary/
397c3ba4-91af-4255-b622-7e1ba09a6fec.description: The Amazon begins transition to Savannah
397c3ba4-91af-4255-b622-7e1ba09a6fec.name: Amazon Savannah

c01f85df-7e9f-45fa-8131-03e7a9b89c35.description: Locusts populations surging throughout east Africa
c01f85df-7e9f-45fa-8131-03e7a9b89c35.name: Locust Infestation

f79ad87d-b169-42a9-8d04-0ca6aea843d8.description: Invasive insects population swarming through forests
f79ad87d-b169-42a9-8d04-0ca6aea843d8.name: Forest Infestation

6da7114c-dfd0-48ca-a0d8-990191a412a7.notes:
The natural analogue to this event took place in 1986, when Lake Nylos in Cameron emitted a large cloud of CO2 that settle over a nearby village and killed 1700 people within minutes.

https://www.theverge.com/2021/8/26/22642806/co2-pipeline-explosion-satartia-mississippi-carbon-capture
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/gassing-satartia-mississippi-co2-pipeline_n_60ddea9fe4b0ddef8b0ddc8f
6da7114c-dfd0-48ca-a0d8-990191a412a7.name: CO2 Leak

cc58d1cb-b0a8-464d-a605-ec8836c22e21.description: Iron Fillings Dump Creates Deadzone in Oceans
cc58d1cb-b0a8-464d-a605-ec8836c22e21.name: Iron Fillings Dead Ocean

8d6a02c6-5b68-44ac-a000-6f1aa3403631.name: West Antarctic Collapse
8d6a02c6-5b68-44ac-a000-6f1aa3403631.notes:
Two randomly generated thresholds at 1.5-2C and 2-2.7C.

https://www.carbonbrief.org/guest-post-how-close-is-the-west-antarctic-ice-sheet-to-a-tipping-point

If warming kept low, sea-level rise will be 2-3mm per year, but after thresholds reached, will increase to 5mm. 

Certain points, cities will have to relocate? Or Will one have to spend significant resources on dikes and things?

(double check this)

2f3d6dbc-a145-41af-a4f7-9a9da4205c85.description: Extreme polar vortex due to destabilized jet stream, which is disrupting food and energy production
2f3d6dbc-a145-41af-a4f7-9a9da4205c85.name: Polar Vortex

6bb73d43-9dc8-4bbd-8684-48e8f10ec47e.name: Large Derecho Storm
6bb73d43-9dc8-4bbd-8684-48e8f10ec47e.notes: 'Derecho' storms (Spanish for 'straight') -- also called 'land hurricanes' -- produce powerful unidirectional gusts of wind  reaching nearly 100 km/h on a broad front (>400 km) that leave devastation in their wake.

b480b6de-2a9d-4a48-9c02-3c11b1f299e2.name: Hydrogen Steel
b480b6de-2a9d-4a48-9c02-3c11b1f299e2.notes:
IPCC report, p. 758, there doesn't seem to be much in terms of greening steel apart from CCS and hydrogen. Focuses on making smaller cars instead

https://www.ipcc.ch/site/assets/uploads/2018/02/ipcc_wg3_ar5_chapter10.pdf

00a4f6c3-e708-427c-acfe-52de344563dc.name: III-V Semiconductors solar panels and perovskite-based panels
00a4f6c3-e708-427c-acfe-52de344563dc.notes:
(TV: III-V semiconductors allow solar's power density to increase up to 400x, releasing land for other use; perovskite panels use artificial light as a power source have a similar effect; as does 'transmittance wafer' panels on buildings)---all increase solar power density

https://www.economist.com/science-and-technology/2019/12/14/transparent-solar-cells-could-be-used-to-glaze-office-blocks

https://www.economist.com/science-and-technology/2020/05/21/new-solar-cells-extract-more-energy-from-sunshine

eefd8ee2-1bb9-4756-b24d-94c1741f8e35.flavor:
Expands area that can be used for wind-turbine deployment beyond land and near-shore to waters >60m deep. E.g. in Europe, this area holds 80% of the region's offshore wind resources.

https://www.hb.fh-muenster.de/opus4/frontdoor/deliver/index/docId/13677/file/03_Tillenburg_EGUJRenEnRev_2021.pdf
eefd8ee2-1bb9-4756-b24d-94c1741f8e35.name: Floating Wind Turbines

41314f73-3fdd-4cca-92f4-9f689ebfeb12.name: Battery Technology?
41314f73-3fdd-4cca-92f4-9f689ebfeb12.notes:
(Improved hydropumps; improved lithium-ion storage; decreased resource cost; increased efficiency)---I'm not sure about these, these seem to belong in 'deployment' I would instead suggest: 'supercapacitor' using “curved” graphene and vertically aligned carbon nanotubes; nickel and maganese cells (NMC) replacing Li-ion batteries

https://www.economist.com/science-and-technology/2020/11/07/how-to-hybridise-batteries-and-supercapacitors

https://www.economist.com/briefing/2020/04/25/lithium-remains-the-car-battery-material-of-choice

Increases energy density by 2 to 10x, which opens up the possibility of electric-powered flight and ground transportation.

b6afe728-ec4f-4265-a33b-8925ebd62af5.name: Ice Sheet Tsunami

69654c23-965e-40b3-bd05-3cd32550a871.name: De-extinction Initiative
69654c23-965e-40b3-bd05-3cd32550a871.notes:
Passenger pigeon, woolly mammoth, Carolina parakeet, bucardo, auroch, gastric-brooding frog...

3 different outcomes (but none of them will change direction of the game):

Scientists clone extinct x, but it is born with a lung defect and dies ten minutes after birth.

Scientists clone large numbers of x, but within a year half of them have perished from hunger or predation, and the outlook for the remaining population is grim.

Scientists have cloned a large number of x, and it seems likely that a viable population might be established if their nature preserve is protected from encroachment by poachers and loggers.

7a6d3fea-09f5-4bb5-91c3-91485d449600.description: A surge in respiratory illnesses thought to be caused by SRM
7a6d3fea-09f5-4bb5-91c3-91485d449600.name: SRM - Respiratory Problems

b3034bb5-7a01-4f1a-ade1-3c75a13d5dab.name: Car Ban
b3034bb5-7a01-4f1a-ade1-3c75a13d5dab.description:
Rebuild cities to rely on public transport, cycling, and walking. Private car ownership banned. Suburbs  become denser, agricultural communities where they aren't levelled completely and rewilded. 

Discontent higher in global north

Lower pollution, lower mortality, reduction in aerosol pollution warms world slightly, healthier population, reduce energy-use for transport drastically

15981220-f02d-4e1e-895d-16280a432d2b.name: Greenland Collapse
15981220-f02d-4e1e-895d-16280a432d2b.notes:
Seems that sea-level rise could be 3-4m by 2100--how to square this?

https://www.haaretz.com/science-and-health/.premium-collapse-of-greenland-ice-sheet-to-raise-sea-level-faster-than-expected-1.9500959

6b782491-fdc9-4afa-86b3-c19db85c1ad7.name: Northern Europe
6b782491-fdc9-4afa-86b3-c19db85c1ad7.notes:
Health:
Using (median of countries in a region): https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/healthcare-access-and-quality-index
"The Healthcare Access and Quality (HAQ) Index is measured on a scale from 0 (worst) to 100
(best) based on death rates from 32 causes of death that could be avoided by timely and
effective medical care (also known as 'amenable mortality')."

See also: https://ourworldindata.org/health-meta
Could also mix in: https://ourworldindata.org/sanitation

---

Outlook:
Could use: https://ourworldindata.org/optimism-pessimism
Or we could just say that, immediately post-revolution, everyone is very hopeful about the future (outlook = 100)

---

Safety:
Could *probably* just be merged into outlook
But if still using it, could use: https://ourworldindata.org/terrorism

387ed612-9b7a-4c81-82db-8a8697172667.name: Direct Air Capture
387ed612-9b7a-4c81-82db-8a8697172667.notes:
to sequester 30 gt C a year by 2100, DACCS would require massive amount of energy, up to 300 EJ. total world energy production in 2020 was 550 EJ. Study includes charts comparing water, land, and energy use by DACCS, BECCS, and afforestation. authors expect it to be scaled up 1.5gt C per year

https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-019-10842-5

630eaa03-40a1-4332-9c5c-759d8bfe97ad.name: Co-Generation
630eaa03-40a1-4332-9c5c-759d8bfe97ad.notes:
Easier if denser cities have also been planned (e.g. banning cars)

Not sure how much it would reduce energy costs for buildings, but a significant amount. Probably this and passive buildings get your energy use down to zero

A simple but effective technology widely used in the USSR and Scandinavia, but failed in the US because it provided unwelcome competition to energy utilities.

0b7b10f9-7574-4e6d-ad67-beb934d0ba75.name: Electric-Arc Furnaces
0b7b10f9-7574-4e6d-ad67-beb934d0ba75.notes:
perhaps there is a bonus if you ban cars (electric-arc furnaces need scrap)

Another ipcc report, seems that EAF is a bit better than other methods, see pg 4.30
https://www.ipcc-nggip.iges.or.jp/public/2019rf/pdf/3_Volume3/19R_V3_Ch04_Metal_Industry.pdf

5e69fb2f-1fa5-4e70-a723-58944141964c.name: Restrictions on Air Travel
5e69fb2f-1fa5-4e70-a723-58944141964c.notes:
Air only used for occasional long-distance travel, all other trips are to be taken by train

IPCC report--no good options for aviation: https://www.ipcc.ch/site/assets/uploads/2018/03/av-en-1.pdf

Breakthroughs around ~2060 possibly

aviation causes only 2% of co2 emissions, so perhaps this is halved

a31e3b21-b18f-4067-a57d-877312697371.name: Wood Skyscrapers
a31e3b21-b18f-4067-a57d-877312697371.notes:
reduces steel demand significantly, but increases demand on tree plantations. Not great if you are doing BECCS, but easy if you have banned meat


great study:
Churkina, Galina, Alan Organschi, Christopher PO Reyer, Andrew Ruff, Kira Vinke, Zhu Liu, Barbara K. Reck, T. E. Graedel, and Hans Joachim Schellnhuber. "Buildings as a global carbon sink." Nature Sustainability 3, no. 4 (2020): 269-276.

Churkina basically has four scenarios, including one with 90% of buildings made of wood rather than 99.5% steel and concrete. Significant co2 sequestration (2-20 Gt C) but needs about 40% of current wood production.

cb38a206-6ee2-48ca-9de8-6ffc980b052b.name: Vegetarian Mandate
cb38a206-6ee2-48ca-9de8-6ffc980b052b.notes:
Increase discontent

reduce demand for land

reduce greenhouse gas emissions

b5f2cffa-8337-4e53-b746-b8832d7666f7.name: Carbon Concrete
b5f2cffa-8337-4e53-b746-b8832d7666f7.notes:
carbon concrete tech, estimates that it can reduce concrete's 2 gigatonne co2 emissions by 0.1-3 g T, so not a huge amount
https://www.dezeen.com/2021/06/15/carbon-capturing-concrete-carbicrete/

b54dc5c7-d58a-4544-98d6-e3f39775a791.name: Hempcrete
b54dc5c7-d58a-4544-98d6-e3f39775a791.notes: hempcrete study, seems to sequester 15kg of co2 per cubic metre of hempcrete Arehart, Jay H., William S. Nelson, and Wil V. Srubar III. "On the theoretical carbon storage and carbon sequestration potential of hempcrete." Journal of Cleaner Production 266 (2020): 121846.  Hemp sequesters a lot of co2, 8-15 tonnes per Ha https://www.dezeen.com/2021/06/30/carbon-sequestering-hemp-darshil-shah-interview/

1cfb4c88-d181-43d5-a624-aba3b2d0df7f.name: Regenerative Agriculture (Crops)
1cfb4c88-d181-43d5-a624-aba3b2d0df7f.notes:
one planning cycle

No till, perennials, biochar, legumes, crop rotation, etc.

'Despite somewhat different scope (land types included) and assumptions (practices considered), there is fairly close alignment among global estimates (Figure 1), suggesting a technical soil C sequestration potential of 2–5 Gt CO2 per year, for what were characterized in the section above as existing best conservation management practices.'

'These rates of C storage could be sustained for a limited time period, on the order of 2–3 decades before decreasing, as soil C levels approach a new equilibrium.'

https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fclim.2019.00008/full

hmm...but it seems that regen-ag may be overhyped. Probably will sequester much less carbon

https://www.wri.org/insights/regenerative-agriculture-good-soil-health-limited-potential-mitigate-climate-change

https://www.quantamagazine.org/a-soil-science-revolution-upends-plans-to-fight-climate-change-20210727/

Not sure. Perennials could lower crop yields significantly. What demands would biochar make on tree plantations? Should increased legume production be linked to vegetarian/vegan shift? Is regen-ag more labour intensive? Requires more N fertilizer, which has its own problems

22da62a4-b76a-4542-a003-cfe0789c7e38.name: Regenerative Agriculture (Livestock)
22da62a4-b76a-4542-a003-cfe0789c7e38.notes:
increases extinction rate

makes population more content

makes it harder to convert to veganism and vegetarianism

nature preserves will be degraded by cattle

no discernable effect on carbon sequestration

173ef01d-23b9-4d48-86fa-8eb20db26548.notes: Heating over several years changes soil microbial ecology, so carbon is released

previous advances in space

b604f545-17ca-4468-a35d-3fa2404557e5.name: The Ark
b604f545-17ca-4468-a35d-3fa2404557e5.description: Biodiversity has been plummeting, and people fear that most of earth's species will be lost forever. This project is an effort to collect and store DNA samples of earth's remaining biodiversity in case the worst should come to pass.
b604f545-17ca-4468-a35d-3fa2404557e5.notes:
Very labor intensive, late-game, only shows up if biodiversity levels are getting very low

This could start a story arc called "Gone Forever" or something like that. Perhaps the player manages to collect many samples but a massive power failure causes all the samples to spoil?
